posts.title: Hello! Glad to see you here.
posts.text: Welcome to Jinghua Yan’s personal website! You will see my blogs and thoughts here. About meMy name is Jinghua Yan / 闫靖华. I don’t have an English name but you can call be Jose if you speak Spanish:)I’m a first-year PhD student at the University of Utah, advised by Prof. P. Sadayappan. I’m interested in ML systems, and I currently work on GNN optimization. Feel free to talk to me if you have similar interests. Prior to joining Utah, I was an intern at ByteDance and got some experience on Computer Vision, or more specifically, human face anti-spoofing and recognition.
